name: Draw.io
details: draw.io is free online diagram software for making flow charts, process diagrams, org charts, UML, ER and network diagrams.

comments.comment: The best free software for draw UML!!
I just stumbled over draw.io and love it a lot! I would instantly make it to my default graphing tool. However, there's no hint about the plans with it - Help says it's a demo application.
This is a very buggy app, do not use.
An user friendly application to make simple to complicated diagrams easily and quickly.
